mapper.insert: insert into event_scene (EVENT_SCENE_ID, EVENT_SCENE_NBR, EVENT_SCENE_NAME, EVENT_SCENE_DESC, EVENT_ID, EXT_EVENT_SCENE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, CONTACT_EVT_CODE) values (#{eventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventSceneNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventSceneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventSceneDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{extEventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactEvtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update event_scene set EVENT_SCENE_NBR = #{eventSceneNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_SCENE_NAME = #{eventSceneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_SCENE_DESC = #{eventSceneDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EXT_EVENT_SCENE_ID = #{extEventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_EVT_CODE = #{contactEvtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVENT_SCENE_ID = #{eventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVENT_SCENE_ID, EVENT_SCENE_NBR, EVENT_SCENE_NAME, EVENT_SCENE_DESC, EVENT_ID, EXT_EVENT_SCENE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, CONTACT_EVT_CODE from event_scene where EVENT_SCENE_ID = #{eventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select EVENT_SCENE_ID, EVENT_SCENE_NBR, EVENT_SCENE_NAME, EVENT_SCENE_DESC, EVENT_ID, EXT_EVENT_SCENE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, CONTACT_EVT_CODE from event_scene

select EVENT_SCENE_ID, EVENT_SCENE_NBR, EVENT_SCENE_NAME, EVENT_SCENE_DESC, EVENT_ID, EXT_EVENT_SCENE_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK, CONTACT_EVT_CODE from event_scene where 1 = 1
and EVENT_ID = #{eventId}
